statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_manuals WHERE id = 1
SELECT equipment_name, manual_text FROM equipment_manuals WHERE equipment_name = 'Printer'
SELECT id, equipment_name, manual_text FROM equipment_manuals ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment_manuals WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%router%'
SELECT id, manual_text FROM equipment_manuals WHERE equipment_name = 'Laptop'
SELECT equipment_name, manual_text FROM equipment_manuals WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM equipment_manuals ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT id, manual_text FROM equipment_manuals WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%generator%';
SELECT * FROM equipment_manuals WHERE id IN (2, 3, 5);

SELECT equipment_name, JSON_EXTRACT(maintenance_records, '$.last_maintenance_date') as last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_manuals WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(maintenance_records, '$.maintenance_status') = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM EquipmentManuals;
SELECT equipment_name, manual FROM EquipmentManuals WHERE equipment_name='Printer';
SELECT id, equipment_name FROM EquipmentManuals ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE equipment_id=3 AND maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM MaintenanceRecords JOIN EquipmentManuals ON EquipmentManuals.id = MaintenanceRecords.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_name;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentManuals ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) FROM EquipmentManuals GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT equipment_name, manual FROM EquipmentManuals WHERE manual IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) FROM MaintenanceRecords GROUP BY equipment_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs
SELECT equipment_name FROM EquipmentManuals
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM EquipmentManuals WHERE equipment_id = 3
SELECT log_id, record_id, log_date FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY log_date DESC
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(record_id) AS maintenance_count FROM MaintenanceRecords GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING COUNT(record_id) > 2
SELECT equipment_name, manual_text FROM EquipmentManuals WHERE equipment_id = 1
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE equipment_id = 2 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT log_date, log_details FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE record_id = 3 AND log_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date ASC

SELECT * FROM EquipmentManuals JOIN MaintenanceRecords ON EquipmentManuals.equipment_id = MaintenanceRecords.equipment_id JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON MaintenanceRecords.record_id = MaintenanceLogs.record_id WHERE EquipmentManuals.equipment_name LIKE 'Generator%'
SELECT * FROM EquipmentManuals;
SELECT id, equipment_name FROM EquipmentManuals ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, manual_text FROM EquipmentManuals WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM MaintenanceRecords ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT name, position FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';

SELECT equipment_name, manual_text FROM EquipmentManuals WHERE id=2;
SELECT equipment_name, manual_text FROM EquipmentManuals WHERE id=1 AND equipment_name='Forklift';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date='2022-03-15';
SELECT name, position FROM Employees WHERE position='Manager';
SELECT * FROM equipment_manuals;
SELECT equipment_name, manual_link FROM equipment_manuals WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, equipment_name, created_at FROM equipment_manuals ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT id, category_name, description FROM equipment_categories WHERE description LIKE '%safety%' ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_manuals;
SELECT equipment_name, created_at FROM equipment_manuals ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, manual_link FROM equipment_manuals WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%printer%';
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM equipment_categories;
SELECT equipment_name, assigned_to, assignment_date FROM equipment_assignments WHERE returned_date IS NULL ORDER BY assignment_date ASC;
